pkgmetadata.longdescription: Escalation with Overdose Control // An implementation of a variety of escalation with overdose control designs introduced by Babb, Rogatko and Zacks (1998) doi:10.1002/(SICI)1097-0258(19980530)17:10%3C1103::AID- SIM793%3E3.0.CO;2-9. It calculates the next dose as a clinical trial proceeds as well as performs simulations to obtain operating characteristics.
